definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to hold/to embrace/to wrap around/to gather around (sb)/to throng/to swarm/to support/Taiwan pr. [yong3]
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: The doors were opened and the audience came crowding in.
sentences.chinese: 大門開了，觀衆一擁而入。

sentences.english: The door burst open and the kids piled into the house.
sentences.chinese: 門突然開了，孩子們一擁而入。

sentences.english: The door flew open and the children rushed in.
sentences.chinese: 房門驀地打開，孩子們一擁而入。
